free_text.Form of examination: Labs 20%, final exam 80% more 1 point bonus for the labs
free_text.Bibliography and material: Patterson and Hennessy, Computer Organization & Design, 3rd Ed., Morgan Kaufmann, 2005[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Logic Systems I and II[br/]Computer Architecture I[br/]
free_text.Content: [li]	Input/output and interrupts[br/][li]	Exceptions[br/][li]	Direct Memory Access[br/][li]	Computer performance[br/][li]	Pipelining[br/][li]	Dynamically scheduled out-of-order processors[br/][li]	Superscalar and VLIW processors[br/][li]	Case studies[br/][li]	Multiprocessors[br/]
free_text.Learning outcomes: Understand the structure of modern processors and the basic sources of performance gain compared to naive multi-cycle implementations. Master basic forms of I/O interfacing. Get a sense of the basic architectural issues in multiprocessors.

en.title: Computer architecture II
en.library_recommends:
• "Computer organization and design : the hardware/software interface / David A. Patterson, John L. Hennessy ; with a contribution by Peter J. Ashenden ... [et al.]". Year:2012. ISBN:978-0-12-374750-1
  • "Digital design : principles and practices / John F. Wakerly". Year:2006. ISBN:0-13-186389-4

free_text.Prérequis: Systèmes logiques I et II[br/]Architecture des ordinateurs I[br/]
free_text.Bibliographie et matériel: John F. Wakerly, Digital design: principles and practices, 4th edition, 2005.[br/]David A. Patterson and John L. Hennessy, Computer organization and design: the hardware/software interface, 4th edition, 2011.[br/]
free_text.Contenu: [li]	Entrées/sorties et interruptions[br/][li]	Exceptions[br/][li]	Accès directe à la mémoire[br/][li]	Performance des ordinateurs[br/][li]	Pipelines[br/][li]	Processeurs à ordonnancement dynamique[br/][li]	Processeurs superscalaires et VLIW[br/][li]	Etudes des cas[br/][li]	Multiprocesseurs
free_text.Forme du contrôle: Travaux pratiques 20%,  examen final 80% plus 1 point bonus pour les labos
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: Comprendre la structure des processeurs modernes et les sources principales de leur performance comparée à des implémentations multi-cycle simples. Comprendre les bases de l'interfaçage des processeurs et les problèmes architecturaux fondamentaux des multiprocesseurs.[br/]

fr.title: Architecture des ordinateurs II
